archimate:CommunicationNetwork.name: Sovrin Main Network
archimate:CommunicationNetwork.documentation: The authoritative version of the Sovrin Ledger operated by Stewards hosting Validator Nodes. The Sovrin Main Network is separate from and complementary to the Sovrin Builder Network and the Sovrin Staging Network.
